verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> Praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> ye the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם <WH8064> from the heavens הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <WH4791> him in the heights
הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> Praise כָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְאָכָ֑יו <WH4397> ye him all his angels הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise כָּל־ <WH3605> all [צְבָאֹו כ] (צְבָאָֽיו׃ <WH6635> appointed time ק)
הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Praise שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> ye him sun וְיָרֵ֑חַ <WH3394> and moon הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise כָּל־ <WH3605> all כּ֥וֹכְבֵי <WH3556> him all ye stars אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> of light

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Praise שְׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> him ye heavens הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heavens וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> and ye waters אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <WH834> after מֵעַ֬ל <WH5921> and הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> that [be] above the heavens

יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ <WH1984> Let them praise אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ה֭וּא <WH1931> He צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> for he commanded וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ <WH1254> and they were created

וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם <WH5975> He hath also stablished לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> them for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and ever חָק־ <WH2706> a decree נָ֝תַ֗ן <WH5414> he hath made וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> which will not יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> which shall not pass

הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> Praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from the earth תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים <WH8577> ye dragons וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> and all deeps

אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> Fire וּ֭בָרָד <WH1259> and hail שֶׁ֣לֶג <WH7950> snow וְקִיט֑וֹר <WH7008> and vapour ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> wind סְ֝עָרָ֗ה <WH5591> stormy עֹשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> fulfilling דְבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> his word
הֶהָרִ֥ים <WH2022> Mountains וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all גְּבָע֑וֹת <WH1389> and all hills עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> trees פְּ֝רִ֗י <WH6529> fruitful וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> and all cedars
הַֽחַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> Beasts וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and all cattle רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ <WH7431> creeping things וְצִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> fowl כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> and flying

מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> Kings אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all לְאֻמִּ֑ים <WH3816> and all people שָׂ֝רִ֗ים <WH8269> princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <WH8199> and all judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
בַּחוּרִ֥ים <WH970> Both young men וְגַם־ <WH1571> again בְּתוּל֑וֹת <WH1330> and maidens זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> old men עִם־ <WH5973> with נְעָרִֽים׃ <WH5288> and children

יְהַלְל֤וּ ׀ <WH1984> Let them praise אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֬ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH7682> alone is excellent שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> for his name לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> alone ה֝וֹד֗וֹ <WH1935> his glory עַל־ <WH5921> is above אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> [is] above the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> and heaven

וַיָּ֤רֶם <WH7311> He also exalteth קֶ֨רֶן ׀ <WH7161> the horn לְעַמּ֡וֹ <WH5971> of his people תְּהִלָּ֤ה <WH8416> the praise לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <WH2623> of all his saints לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> [even] of the children יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel עַֽם־ <WH5971> a people קְרֹב֗וֹ <WH7138> near הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> unto him Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
